header.title: PORTFOLIO.
header.text_header: Self-taught individual with 7+ years of experience in web development, including 5+ years working in companies, specializing in the creation and optimization of software solutions in both frontend and backend.

aboutme.text_aboutme: I began my professional career from home, self-taught, due to my burning passion for learning, taking on new challenges, and continuously improving my programming, logic, and performance skills. My journey in this field is not just about fulfilling a dream of working in front of a computer; it is based on my determination to excel and my desire to share my knowledge with the world. IT is not just a profession for me; it is a way of life and a true passion. Even when I'm not formally working, my commitment persists. Day after day, I dedicate time to study, explore the documentation of the latest technologies, stay informed about emerging trends, and constantly seek opportunities for innovation. My self-taught approach has not only allowed me to acquire valuable skills on my own but has also driven me to overcome obstacles and bring a fresh and creative approach to the projects I engage in. I believe that this passion and constant commitment are qualities that can make a difference in any professional environment. With over 7 years of experience in web development, including 5 years working in companies, I have specialized in creating and optimizing software solutions in both frontend and backend, using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, PHP, and NodeJS Express, among others. In my last role at Previlabor, I significantly contributed to improving internal processes, including the implementation of an automated document generation system and a RESTful web API service for Laboratorios Echevarne, which increased efficiency by more than 15%. Additionally, I achieved notable optimization in PDF document generation within the company's ERP, reducing processing time from one hour to just 4 seconds. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that not only enhance operational efficiency but also have a positive impact on revenue and productivity. My experience has allowed me to develop strong skills in problem-solving, process optimization, and teamwork. I am seeking opportunities where I can contribute my web development experience and continue to grow professionally.

experiences_title.second: Full Stack Developer at Sogeti SL

second: Development of user interfaces and data management using JavaScript and PHP, utilizing frameworks such as React and Laravel, and using RESTful APIs.
third: Development of applications for different departments
Consumption and use of web services
Analysis of created applications and search for solutions for improvement
